issue.title: New component EasySDI Processing
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This component will permit to order processings.

In the backend, administrator will be able to add new processing types (Quality check, geocoding, isochron calculation)
In the frontend, the user will be able to order new processings and/or to upload the result of a processing ordered.

A processing type will be tagged as automatic or manual. A REST service will expose the automatic processing orders as it is done in the shop component.

Plugins could be associated to a processing type in order to add specific features as moderate quality checks.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
